title: I have never used malicious 3rd party programs or modifications, my account has been banned
body: I have never used malicious 3rd party programs or modifications, and I have spent over 1800 NZ dollars on my account, you told me my account has been banned? I need a explanation and an apology!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!This made me really angry!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! contact me as soon as possible!!!!!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

As this is an account specific inquiry, we here on the boards are unable to assist you.

Your best bet would be to [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to have your ban reviewed, please do not submit multiple tickets or unnecessarily add information or "Bump" your ticket as this will push you to the back of the ticket queue and delay a response further.
I did it, but they can't see the reality, please help me to contact them, ban people who really use these programs not people who don't.
